system.description:
BRAWLER

ALSO: Martial Artist, Pugilist, Street Fighter

  • Are you trying to win a tournament, or did someone steal your significant other?

  • Would you eat floor chicken? What about wall chicken?

  • Which stereotypes of your culture do you embody?

  • How many times were you thrown off a volcano?

BRAWLER FREE BENEFITS

  • Permanently increase your maximum Health Points by 5.

PREDATOR SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.hG34QQWLn0oW1tRM]{Attack Chain}

Whenever you hit a target with an unarmed attack, mark them as your Attack Chain target.
Your next action against them spends the mark but gains a +1 bonus to its Accuracy or Magic Check.

Whenever you mark a target, remove your mark from everyone else. The mark is automatically cleared at the end of the scene.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.mMAF7OQ047j4JqA7]{Combo Breaker} (SL2)

At the start of every conflict, gain 【SL】 Combo Break Counters. If you’re not wearing Martial Armor, you may spend one Counter at any time to dodge an attack.

You lose all of these Counters whenever there’s a scene change.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.mDEwE0XISdc9Hr9J]{Command Grab} (SL3)

When you hit an unarmed melee attack against a single opponent, you may choose to deal no damage and instead perform an Opposed Check with 【DEX + MIG】. If successful, your attack will instead deal twice its original damage, ignoring Vulnerability.
You gain a 【SL】 bonus to your check.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.aCw4kpkM9AyVVOwH]{Command Input} (SL5)

As an action, choose a number of Inputs up to 【SL】 and spend 【5 x Inputs】 MP.
Perform a check with 【DEX + INS】 against a difficulty of 【6 + Inputs】.
If you succeed, perform an unarmed Free Attack, adding as many effects from the following list as the Inputs you chose (each may only be chosen once) :

  • Powerful: Deal +5 Damage.

  • Quick: Add a +3 bonus to the Accuracy Check.

  • Anti-air: May target Flying foes: On hit, they become grounded.

  • Screen-clear: Gain Multi (3).

  • Stun: Apply Slow or Dazed on hit.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.9iYytTSGAbEXr8Qo]{Perfect Parry}

When you are about to be hit by a melee attack, you may perform an Accuracy Check as if you were attacking with an unarmed melee attack. Compare their results:
If you roll above it, treat that attack’s damage as if you Resist it.
If you roll below it, treat the attack’s damage as if you are Vulnerable to it.
If you match it, dodge that attack instead, ignoring all of its effects.

During conflict scenes and unless you matched the difficulty, you may not do this again until the start of your next turn.
